com.psddev.dari.util

Class SourceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.AbstractFilter
      • com.psddev.dari.util.SourceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class SourceFilter
extends AbstractFilter
    Enables rapid web application development by making source code changes immediately available.

    To configure, add these definitions to the web.xml deployment descriptor file: 

    <filter>
    <filter-name>SourceFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>com.psddev.dari.util.SourceFilter</filter-class>
</filter>
<filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>SourceFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
</filter-mapping>

    And the application must include a build.properties file that specifies the locations of the source code:

    • CodeUtils.JAVA_SOURCE_DIRECTORY_PROPERTY
    • WEBAPP_SOURCES_PROPERTY

    You can skip this step if the project uses Apache Maven to manage the build and inherits from com.psddev:dari-parent, because that parent POM automatically adds those properties during the generate-resources phase.

        protected void doInit()
        Description copied from class: AbstractFilter
        Triggers when this filter needs to be initialized. A subclass must override this method instead of AbstractFilter.init(javax.servlet.FilterConfig). The FilterConfig object normally available as an argument can be accessed using AbstractFilter.getFilterConfig().

        protected void doDispatch(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
              javax.servlet.FilterChain chain)
                   throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractFilter
        Triggers when this filter needs to process a page. This method will delegate to one of: AbstractFilter.doError(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain), AbstractFilter.doInclude(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain), AbstractFilter.doForward(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain), or AbstractFilter.doRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain).
        Overrides:
        doDispatch in class AbstractFilter

        request - Can't be null.
